name: 李文毅
objective:
本課程整合微軟 Azure Open AI 雲端服務資源，運用問題分析能力進行實作與相關應用，以企業出題學生解題 PBL 模式導入人工智慧跨域專題實作，目的在幫助學生瞭解如何運用人工智慧技術來解決現實世界中的問題。
本課程透過導入人工智慧在企業管理和決策、金融、數據分析、智慧製造等領域等應用案例，並以通用人工智慧跨域應用學習模式來跨域應用至數據分析、智慧運算、智慧製造及物流、商情預測、經營管理、金融等領域。透過本課程的修習，學生將獲得實際的跨學科專題實作能力，掌握人工智慧技術的應用和發展趨勢，養成專業職能和研發實力，並培育具有創業與創新精神人才，了解產業在數位轉型中，所面臨的困難與挑戰。
This course integrates resources from Microsoft Azure's Open AI cloud services, utilizing problem analysis skills for practical implementation and related applications. It introduces an industry-proposed, student-solved Project-Based Learning (PBL) model into the interdisciplinary project implementation of artificial intelligence. The aim is to help students understand how to apply AI technology to solve real-world problems.
Through the introduction of artificial intelligence applications in enterprise management and decision-making, finance, data analysis, and smart manufacturing, the course enables students to gain practical interdisciplinary project implementation skills. This course also helps students understand the difficulties and challenges faced by industries in digital transformation.
schedule:
Week 1. Introduction/The Fundamentals of Machine Learning
Week 2. End-to-End Machine Learning Project/Classification
Week 3. Training Models/Support Vector Machines
Week 4. Decision Trees/ Ensemble Learning and Random Forests
Week 5. Dimensionality Reduction/ Unsupervised Learning Techniques
Week 6. Introduction to Artificial Neural Networks
Week 7. Training Deep Neural Networks
Week 8. Deep Neural Networks with PyTorch
Week 9. Midterm
Week 10. Deep learning related issues
Week 11. Deep learning related issues
Week 12. Azure Open AI
Week 13. Azure Open AI
Week 14. Azure Open AI
Week 15. Azure Open AI
Week 16. Azure Open AI
Week 17. Azure Open AI
Week 18. Final
materials:
Hands-On Machine Learning with Scikit-Learn, Keras, and TensorFlow: Concepts, Tools, and Techniques to Build Intelligent Systems 3rd
出版者: O'Reilly Media; 第 3 版 (2022 年 11 月 8 日)
語言: English
Paperback: 861 頁
ISBN-10: 1098125975
ISBN-13: 978-1098125974
consultation: For further questions, please get in touch with the teaching assistants.
